She has five children to raise and her greatest wish is to improve the conditions of her home.

The other members of the group are Margarita del Carmen Gómez, the mother of two children who sells clothing and products manufactured by Avon and Zermat, and Brígida Mejía, who is 23 years old and has a small child. She is expecting her second child and also sells Avon and Zermat products through a catalog.

loans.use: Purchase cosmetics

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Pay for repairs to her stove & purchase corn

loans.name: Avon Group

texts.es:
El grupo Avon lo conforman cuatro mujeres trabajadoras, esforzadas y emprendedora una de ella es la señora Deysi María Áreas  de 48 años quien vende ropa desde hace 3 años quien en sus inicios comercializando ropa usada. Ella invertirá el crédito en camisas, blusas, vestidos, faldas y zapatos que tiene de encargos. 
Las otras integrantes son Ninex B. quien vende ropa y zapatos desde hace tres años, Catalina M. comercializa ropa y Yahira L. vende productos Avon.
texts.en:
The Avon Group consists of four hardworking, industrious, and enterprising women. One of them is Sra. Deysi María Áreas, age 48, who has been selling clothing for three years. She started out selling used clothing. Deysi will invest her loan in shirts, blouses, dresses, skirts, and shoes for which she has received orders.

The other members are Ninex B. who has been selling clothing and shoes for three years, Catalina M. who sells clothing, and Yahira L. who sells Avon products.

loans.use: Purchase clothing to sell

loans.name: Norma

texts.es:
Norma es socia del Banco comunal Despertar, tiene 31 años, es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos. Norma se dedica a la venta de ropa para damas caballeros y niños. Norma empezó a trabajar en una tienda de prendas de vestir en Lima, ahí aprendió el negocio, junto un pequeño capital y comenzó a vender en la calle como ambulante. Norma viajaba a Ayacucho para las ferias de Semana Santa, nació su hija y se quedó en Ayacucho hace 9 años y casi el mismo tiempo está en FINCA, ahora tiene una tienda en la Galería Unión Olarte. A Norma le gustan las capacitaciones que recibe en su Banco Comunal porque puede acceder a los créditos y ahorrar.
El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de prendas de vestir para surtir su mercadería ahora que se aproxima la campaña navideña.
Su sueño es poder tener su propia tienda comercial y poder sacar profesionales a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Norma is a member of the Awakening Communal Bank. She is 31 years old and lives with her partner and 3 children. Norma sells women, men and children's clothing. She began working in a clothing store in Lima. There she learned the business, and with a little capital she began to sell clothing as a street vendor. Norma traveled to Ayucucho for the Holy Week festival. Her daughter was born and she stayed in Ayacucho 9 years ago and almost at the same time she is in FINCA, and now she has a store in the Union Olarte Gallery. Norma likes the x that she receives in her Communal Bank because she can access her credit and savings accounts.

She is asking for a loan to invest in purchasing clothing articles to increase her available merchandise now that the Christmas season is approaching.  Her dream is to be able to have her own commercial store and be able to see her children become professionals.

loans.use: To buy articles of clothing

loans.name: Manuela

texts.es:
Manuela es socia del Banco comunal Despertar, tiene 47 años, es casada y tiene 2 hijos D. 23 y 20 años D. edad. Manuela es feriante, viaja a las feria D. Seccelambras llevando abarrotes en general, ahí compra cereales y los trae a Ayacucho, lo venD. en el mercado mayorista Playa Grau o a veces a su casero que es mayorista que lo lleva a Ica.
Su sueño es que su negocio crezca y que sus hijos puedan terminar su carrera profesional en la Universidad.
texts.en:
Manuela, a member of the “Despertar” ("To Awaken") Communal Bank, is 47 years old, married, and has 2 children, aged 23 and 20. She is a stall-holder and travels to the Seccelambras fair, carrying groceries in general. There she buys grains and brings them back to Ayacucho to sell in the Playa Grau (Grau Beach) wholesale market, or at times, for her own wholesaler who sells them in Ica.

Manuela's dream is that her business will grow and her children will finish their professional career studies in the University.

loans.use: TO BUY VARIOUS GRAINS TO SELL

loans.name: Honestidad Group

texts.es:
El grupo solidario Honestidad se encuentra conformado por cuatro mujeres trabajadoras y esmeradas. La coordinadora del grupo es la señora Patricia del Socorro E. Mora tiene una pulpería con muchos rubros de distintas clases como golosinas, medicamentos, refrescos, enlatados, artículos de uso personal e higiene, entre otros. Ella invertirá el crédito en mayor cantidad de productos con el fin de surtir su negocio.
Elsa Marina Lagos Rodríguez vende en su casa, comida, refrescos y sopas; Leoncida E. vende tortillas y frijoles cocidos; y Reyna Isabel vende ropa usada de manera ambulante.
texts.en:
The Honestidad solidarity group is comprised of four hard working women.  The coordinator of the group is Mrs. Patricia del Socorro E. Mora who has a grocery store where she sells all kinds of sweets, medicines, softdrinks, canned goods, and personal hygiene products, among others.  She will invest the loan in buying more products to stock her business.

Elsa Marina Lagos Rodríguez sells food, softdrinks and soups out of her home.  Leoncida E. sells tortillas and beans.  Reyna Isabel has a door-to-door used clothing business.

loans.use: To buy basic grains, sweets, etc.

loans.name: G.s. Divino Niño N. 10 Group

texts.es: El Grupo Solidario Divino Niño N. 10 lo conforman Dolores y Rosa Emelina, esta no es la primera vez que realizan financiamientos. Dolores se dedica a la venta de mercadería en general, ella es una persona muy eficiente por lo que les gusta mucho este medio de vida. Rosa Emelina tiene la venta de bolsas plásticas la necesidad de buscar una fuente de ingresos para sufragar los gastos de su familia, pues siempre le ha gustado mejorar su actividad y está pendiente para mejorar su actividad, juntas han logrado salir adelantes con sus negocio. Actualmente solicitan este crédito para la compra de  materia prima necesaria.
texts.en:
The Divino Niño N.10 solidarity group is comprised of Dolores and Rosa Emelina and this is not their first request for a loan.  

Dolores is a very efficient person who enjoys her business of selling general merchandise.  Rosa Emelina sells plastic bags in order to provide an income for her family.  She has always wanted to improve her business and is a hard worker.  Together they have been able to succeed in their respective activities.  They are currently requesting a loan to buy necessary raw materials.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Las Nuevas Del Barrio Group

texts.es:
El grupo Las Nuevas del Barrio lo conforman tres personas trabajadoras, esforzadas y emprendedoras una de ellas es Araceli de los Ángeles L. Sandoval de 30 años quien comercializa de todo un poco como sandalias, bolsos, ropa de paca etc. Ella es madre de dos niños de 11 y 10 años por los cuales trabaja arduamente. 
Ella invertirá el préstamo en pedidos de ropa y en nuevos estilos.

Los otros integrantes son Luisa Emilia M. Tinoco de 32 años quien vende libros naturistas y ropa y Marvin Agusto Jarez de 22 años comercializa ropa.
texts.en:
Las Nuevas del Barrio group is made up of three hardworking entrepreneurs. One of the members is Aracely de los Ángeles L. Sandoval, age 30, who sells a variety of products such as sandals, handbags, clothing in bulk, etc.

She is the mother of two children, ages 11 and 10, and she works tirelessly to support them. Aracely will invest her loan in the purchase of more clothing in the newest styles. 

Another member of the group is Luisa Emilia M. Tinoco, age 32, who sells nature books and clothing and Marvin Agusto Juares who is 22 years old and also sells clothes.

loans.use: Purchase of merchandise: footwear, clothing, and handbags

loans.name: Adalberto Enrique

texts.es:
Adalberto, es comerciante de medicina alimenticia, tiene 24 años de edad, reside en San Miguel, departamento de San Miguel con su esposa y dos hijos de 5 y 3 años de edad, él está trabajando de 7:00am a 5:00pm este es su fuente de ingreso para cubrir las necesidades del hogar.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de medicina  ya que por momento su inventario este vacio, con este préstamo ayudara a tener constante medicamento para ofrecer a los clientes y poder atender sus necesidades.
Sueña que a través del negocio pueda convertirse en un gran empresario mayorista de medicamentos y lograr estabilizar los ingresos para su hogar.
texts.en:
Adalberto is a salesman who sells nutritional medicine.  He is 24 years old and lives in San Miguel, in San Miguel department, with his wife and two children aged 5 and 3.  He works from 7.00am to 5.00pm.  This is his source of income with which he covers his household needs.

Adalberto is requesting a loan to buy medicine since at the moment he has no inventory.  This loan will help him to have medicine available constantly to offer to his customers and serve their needs.  Adalberto dreams that, through his business, he will be able to become a wholesaler of medicines and manage to stabilize his household income.

loans.use: To buy medicine

loans.name: Renovacion Las Aguilas 3 Group

texts.en:
Maria is the coordinator of her group Renovacion las Aguilas 3 (eagles renewal). She makes her home here in a simple structure with her long-term partner and their three children. She says that her dream is to have her own house. 

Maria is excited to be taking her fourth loan with Esperanza after having successfully repaid her previous loan and grown her business. She has had her business for amost 2 years, starting with her first Esperanza loan. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business by buying different products like clothing, shoes, and cosmetics to sell. 

Maria began with us because she wants to progress and have a business. Her  story is representative of her group and of Esperanza's Haitian and Dominican clients generally, many of whom recently emigrated to the DR from Haiti. Her group is located in Santiago, an area famous for tobacco and beef production, and the second biggest city in the Dominican Republic. This area, like nearly all impoverished areas of the Dominican Republic, suffers from unreliable electricity and running water—none of which is potable.

loans.use: to buy miscellaneous products to sell

loans.name: Eurocina Mercedes

texts.es:
Eurocina es socia del Banco comunal Despertar, es separada, tiene 56 años y 1 hijo. Se dedica a la venta de ropa para bebes. Solicita un préstamo para surtir su mercadería ahora que se aproxima las fiestas navideñas.
Eurocina, antes vivía y tenia su negocio en Ica, conoció con su pareja y decidieron vivir en Ayacucho, aprendió de este negocio de una amiga, antes era ambulante, ahora cuenta con un puesto en el Mercado 12 de Abril. Su sueño es que su negocio pueda crecer y que su hijo termine sus estudios.
texts.en:
Eurocina is a member of the Despertar community bank.  She is 56 years old, separated and has one child.  She sells baby clothes.  She is requesting a loan to stock her business with merchandise now that the Christmas holidays are approaching.

Eurocina used to live in Ica and had her business there.  However, she met her partner and they decided to go and live in Ayacucho.  She learned about this business from a friend.  She used to sell her products as an itinerant street vendor.  She now has a stall in the '12 de Abril' market.  Her dream is for her business to grow and for her son to finish his studies.

loans.use: To buy a variety of clothes

loans.name: Yanira Del Carmen

texts.es:
Yanira, reside en Cacaopera, departamento de Morazán, junto a su familia que está conformada por su esposo, dos hijos de las edades de 8 y 12 años, ambos estudian, ella tiene 35 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras desde hace dos años, negocio que aprendió por la necesidad de obtener ingresos para ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar, las ventas las realiza de 7:00am a 5:00pm, con los vecinos de la zona y personas que transitan por el lugar.
Actualmente ella quiere realizar compras de mercadería para el negocio, por lo que solicita un préstamo para hacer la inversión en manzanas, bananas, uvas, sandias, con esta ayuda estará contando con mercadería para ofrece a los clientes y tener la oportunidad de vender más.
Las aspiraciones de ella es ver crecer el negocio, comprar un vehículo para vender a domicilio por varios lugares, y de esta forma ampliarse y tener mejores ganancias para crecer a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Yanira lives in Cacaopera, in Morazán department, with her family: her husband and two children aged 8 and 12 who are both studying.  Yanira is 35 years old and she has been selling fruit and vegetables for two years.  She learned her business out of necessity.  She needed to earn some income to help her husband with their household expenses.  She makes her sales from 7.00am to 5.00pm.  She sells to her neighbors and people passing through.

Yanira would currently like to buy merchandise for her business which is why she is requesting a loan.  She will invest in buying apples, bananas, grapes and watermelons.  With this help she will have merchandise to offer her customers and the opportunity to sell more.

Yanira's aspirations are to see her business grow, to buy a vehicle so that she can sell door-to-door in some places and, in this way, to expand and make better profits with which she can support her children.

loans.use: To buy fruit

loans.name: Sabrina Group

texts.es:
El grupo Sabrina está conformado por tres mujeres trabajadoras, esforzadas y emprendedoras una de ellas es la señora Ruth Ileana Gutiérrez Roberto propietaria de un pequeño kiosco donde comercializa desde gaseosa, chiverías y cigarro, además vende perfumes y cremas desde hace 12 años.  Ella con el crédito invertirá en la realización de comida y la compra de mercadería en perfumes y cremas.
Las otras integrantes de son Elena María C. Gonzales tiene una pequeña pulpería y vende ropa, Sabrina Walkiria Guilllen Vega comercializa ropa y  Estela del Socorro R. propietaria de un modesto comedor desde hace 17 años y vende ropa.
texts.en: The Sabrina group consists of four hardworking and entrepreneurial women. One of them is Ruth Ileana Gutiérrez Roberto who runs a small kiosk where she sells soft drinks, yogurts, and cigarettes; she's also been selling perfume and lotions for over 12 years. Ruth plans to use the loan to purchase kiosk inventory as well as perfume and lotion merchandise. The other members of the group are Elena María C. Gonzales, Sabrina Walkiria Guilllen Vega, and Estela del Socorro R.. Elena runs a small convenience store and also sells clothing; Sabrina sells clothing; Estela has been running a modest diner for 17 years and also sells clothing.

loans.use: Purchase of kiosk inventory

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase of a dairy cow

loans.name: Antonia

texts.es:
Antonia es socia del Banco Comunal Glorioso, es conviviente, tiene 47 años y 6 hijos de 15, 14, 13, 9, 8 y 1 año de edad. Antonia se dedica a la siembra de papa, trigo, maíz y también a la venta de cereales.
Antonia vive en Chiara, se dedica a la siembra, desde muy niña aprendió de este oficio de sus padres, ahora realiza éste trabajo con su pareja e hijos.
Antonia viaja a las ferias para ayudarse, compra variedad de cereales y los vende el Mercado Mayorista Nery Gracia Zarate. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de cereales.
Le gusta las reuniones de su Banco Comunal porque puede acceder a los créditos y puede ahorrar.
Su sueño es poder ahorrar para la educación de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Antonio is a member of the community bank named "Glorioso". She lives with her partner, she is 47 years old and she has 6 children aged, 15, 14, 13, 9, 8, and a 1 year-old. Antonia harvests potatoes, wheat, corn, and she also resells cereal grains. 

Antonio lives in Chiara and she is an agriculturist. Since she was a young girl she learned the trade from her parents and today this is the business she carries out alongside her partner and children. 

Antonia travels to the fairs to stock up on cereal grains for resale in the wholesale market of Nery Garcia Zarate. The loan that she requests will be invested in the purchase of cereal grains. 

She enjoys the meetings at her community bank because she has access to loans and she is able to save money. 

Her dream is to save enough money for her kids' education.

loans.use: To purchase cereal grains.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana M. es una mujer trabajadora y esforzada  de 32 años quien en 1992 con un chancho inicio su negocio de destace de cerdo, es decir comercializa la carne de cerdo y hace comida a base de este animal como son los nacatamales, moronga, frito, chicharrón…etc. En la actualidad su negocio gracias a su ardua labor y los préstamos ha ido progresando.
Ella tiene dos hijos de 10 y 7 años por quienes trabaja arduamente y con la ayuda de su madre ha sacado adelante.
texts.en:
Juana M. is a hardworking person who is 32 years old. In 1992 she started her butchering business with only one pig. She sells pork meat and she also sells various prepared foods made from pork. Her business has been growing thanks to her arduous work and the loans she has received.

She has two children, aged 10 and 7 years old, for whom she works so tirelessly. She has been able to provide for her children with her mother's help.

loans.use: To purchase livestock.

loans.name: Cristina

texts.es:
Cristina es socia del Banco Comunal Glorioso, es casada, tiene 70 años y 3 hijos. Cristina tiene una tienda D. abarrotes en general que atienD. en su casa, donD. venD. aguas, gaseosas y otros productos. 
El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en surtir su tienda como: arroz, azúcar, aceite, fideos, harina, leche, etc. Cristina antes tenia un puesto D. papas en el mercado D. la Magdalena y decidió abrir una tienda D. abarrotes en su casa.
A Cristina le gusta las reuniones D. su Banco Comunal porque le dan créditos y pueD. ahorrar.
Su sueño es que su negocio crezca.
texts.en: Cristina, age 70, is a member of the Glorioso communal bank; she is married and has three children. Cristina has a convenience store located in her home where she sells water, soft drinks, and other products. She is seeking a loan in order to buy inventory for her store, including items such as: rice, sugar, cooking oil, noodles, flour, milk, etc. In the past, Cristina used to sell potatoes in the Magdalena market but now decided to open a grocery store in her home. Cristina enjoys the meetings of her communal bank because it allows her to obtain credit and also to save. Her dream is to see her business grow.

loans.use: purchase rice, cooking oil, noodles, etc

loans.name: Bacilia

texts.es: Basilia Cruz C. es una mujer trabajadora, esforzada y emprendedora de 48 años quien inicio con un pequeño caramanchel donde vendía arroz, aceite, chiverías etc. actualmente tiene una pequeña venta y realiza buñuelos (postre a base de yuca, queso y miel) negocios en los que invertirá el préstamo.
texts.en: Basilia Cruz C., age 48, is a hardworking, industrious, and entrepreneurial woman who has started her business by putting up a tiny awning where she sold rice, cooking oil, yogurts, etc. Currently, Basilia has a small shop and also sells buñuelos (a type of deep-fried dessert made of cassava, cheese, and honey). She plans to invest the loan into these businesses.

loans.use: Purchase of staple grains and ingredients for making deep-fried snacks (buñuelos)

loans.name: Miriam Roxana

texts.es:
Miriam de 35 años, es vendedora de productos de uso personal y ropa hace varios años atrás. Comenzó con el comercio porque siempre le gusto promocionar y vender. 

Viviendo con su esposo y tres hijos de 12, 10 y 8 años en una zona urbana llamada Orquídeas de Guayaquil (zona urbana, llamada las orquídeas porque en su descubrimiento habían muchas flores orquídeas). Ha trabajado promocionando a sus vecinos y amigas los productos y ropa de diferentes precios económicos. 

Como es una mujer trabajadora y que siempre le ha gustado obtener su propio dinero para ayudar a su familia quiere continuar con esta actividad de vender productos de uso personal y ropa con el préstamo para seguir asegurando a su familia económicamente. En el futuro quiere darle una mejor calidad de vida a sus familias.
texts.en:
Miriam is 35 years old and she has been selling personal products and clothing for many years. She started her business because she has always enjoyed promotions and sales.

She lives together with her husband and their three children, aged 12, 10 and 8 years old, in an urban region named Orquideas de Guayaquil (an urban region, named orquideas because when it was first colonized many orchid flowers were found). She has has been selling to her neighbors and her friends various products and clothing in a wide range of prices. 

Since she is a hardworking person and since she has always liked to have her own money to support her family she wants to keep her business running, selling personal use products and clothing. The loan will ensure that she will be able to continue to support her family financially. IN the future she wants to provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: To purchase clothing, perfumes, and skin creams.

loans.name: Gertrudis Ramona

texts.es: Gertrudis Ramona tiene 54 años, se dedica a la venta de pan desde hace 22 años,  los cuales vende por encargos de forma ambulante. Esta no es la primera vez que realiza financiamiento por lo que se siente muy contenta con este medio de vida. Inicio esta actividad debido a la necesidad de empleo pues no tenia los recursos suficientes para salir adelante. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de azúcar, aceite, huevo, mantequilla, harina entre otros. Por lo que nos encontramos en una temporada en que tiene muchos pedidos.
texts.en: Gertrudis Ramona is 54 years old and has worked for 22 years selling bread. She takes orders and delivers the bread on foot. Gertrudis is very happy with her life style. She started selling bread out of necessity because she had no other way to support herself. This isn't the first time she has received financing. The loan will be used to buy sugar, oil, eggs, butter, and flour, among other ingredients. Gertrudis needs more working capital because she  currently has a lot of orders to complete.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Zinia Mitmey

texts.es:
Zinia es socia del Banco Comunal Emprendedoras, es casada y tiene 24 años.
Se dedica a la venta de pescados. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en surtir su mercadería, (comprar variedad de pescados).
Zinia trabaja en la venta de pescados desde muy niña,aprendió de este negocio de su mamá, Zinia sólo vende los sábados y domingos tiene un puesto en el terminal pesquero hay fechas en la que viaja llevando su mercadería a la feria de Andahuaylas.
Le gusta FINCA Perú, porque le dan préstamos y puede ahorrar, le gusta mucho las capacitaciones porque aprende mucho en diferente temas como: la familia, matrimonio, negocios, escalera del desarrollo.
Su sueño es llegar hacer un mayorista en la venta de pescado como su mamá.
texts.en:
Zinia is a member of the communal bank Emprendedoras. She's 24-years-old and married. 

She sells fish. She'll use this loan to stock up her merchandise (buy a variety of fish). Zinia has worked selling fish since she was very young. She learned the business from her mother. Zinia only sells on Saturdays and Sundays. She has a stand at the fishing terminal. Some days she travels with her merchandise to the fair in Andahuaylas. She likes FINCA Perú because they give her loans and she can save. She likes the training because she learns a lot on different subjects such as: family, marriage, business, and development. Her dream is to become a wholesale fish vendor like her mother.

loans.use: Purchase of various fish

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase of a cow

loans.name: Ubania

texts.es:
Ubania del Carmen P. es una mujer trabajadora, esforzada y emprendedora de 33 años la cual es dueña de una barbería la cual inicio con una silla de barbería que compro de segunda mano en la actualidad con este crédito piensa comprar una silla nueva especial para la barbería. 
Ella era integrante del grupo Brizas del Mar la cual fue graduada a crédito individual ya que el crecimiento de su negocio y su buena historia de crédito cumple para la metodología individual.
texts.en: Ubania del Carmen P. is a hardworking, enterprising, and tenacious woman. She's 33-years-old and she owns a barber's shop. She started this business with a second-hand barber's chair. Currently, with this loan, she hopes to buy a new chair. She was a member of the group Brizas del Mar, but she graduated to individual loans because her business grew and her good credit record made her eligible for an individual loan.

loans.use: Purchase of a special barber's chair

loans.name: Leticia

texts.es:
La señora Leticia Odón  M., mujer trabajadora, esforzada y emprendedora de 50 años la cual tiene un puesto de venta de carne, pollo y refresco naturales desde hace 7 años. Este negocio ha ido creciendo gracias a su ardua labor y actualmente desea comprar otro fizer lo que le permitiría aumentar su negocio. 
Ella era integrante del grupo Brizas del Mar la cual fue graduada a crédito individual ya que el crecimiento de su negocio y su buena historia de crédito cumple para la metodología individual.
texts.en: Mrs. Leticia Odón  M. is a hard-working and enterprising fifty-year old woman. She has a stand where she sells meat, chicken, and natural fruit drinks, a business she has had for seven years. Thanks to her hard work this business has been growing and now she wants to buy another freezer with would help her grow her business. She used to be a member of the communal bank "Brizas del Mar"  from which she graduated.   Because her business has grown and she has a good credit history she qualifies for individual credit.

loans.use: Chicken, meat, and fruits for drinks

loans.name: Eliana Cinthya

texts.es:
Eliana es socia del Banco Comunal Emprendedoras, tiene 20 años, es conviviente y tiene 1 hija de 7 meses de nacida. Se dedica a la venta de ropas para damas caballeros y niños por pedidos.
El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá para surtir su mercadería ahora que se acerca la campaña navideña.
Eliana antes tenia un puesto de ropa y lo cerró, le sale mas a cuenta atender sólo pedidos y le va bien le pagan en forma semanal.
Le gusta las reuniones de su Banco Comunal porque comparte gratos momentos con sus compañeras , aprende mucho en las capacitaciones que recibe de su promotora, accede al crédito y puede ahorrar. 
Su sueño es que su negocio crezca y poder abrir una tienda propia de prendas de vestir.
texts.en: Elian is a member of the communal bank "Emprendedoras."  She is 20 years old, lives with her partner, and has a 7 month old daughter.  She sells women's, men's, and children's clothing by order.  She will invest the loan she is taking out to stock her merchandise now that it is almost Christmas.  Eliana used to have a clothing stand that she closed because it is more profitable for her to take orders.  This is going well for her and she is paid weekly.  She likes the meetings with her communal bank because she has a good time with her friends and learns a lot in the trainings she gets from her promoter.  She can accesses loans and save.  Her dream is to grow her business and be able to open her own clothing shop.

loans.use: To purchase clothing.

loans.name: Esteban

texts.es:
el señor Esteban R. tiene 48 años de edad, esta casado y es padre de una hija, viven en la colonia Buena Vista desde hace 4 años, todos los dias se traslada al mercado viejo de San Lorenzo de lunes a sabado a realizar sus ventas. Esteban cuando las ventas estan malas se dedica a costurar zapatos usados.
El es una persona muy trabajadora y responsable. su esposa le ayuda a vender ropa cuando el anda haciendo trabajos de zapateria en otros lugares.
el credito lo utilzara para comprar ropa para vender en la epoca de navidad.
las ganancias las necesita para cubrir los gastos del hogar.
texts.en:
Esteban R. is 48 years old.  He is married and has one daughter.  He has been living in Buena Vista neighborhood for four years.  He travels to the 'Mercado Viejo' (Old Market) in San Lorenzo, from Monday to Saturday, to make his sales.  When sales are bad, Esteban sews used shoes.

Esteban is a very hard-working and responsible person.  His wife helps him to sell clothes when he goes off to do his shoe repair work in other places.

Esteban will use this loan to buy clothes to sell during the Christmas season.  He needs the profits from his business to cover his household expenses.

loans.use: To buy jeans, shirts, t-shirts, blouses and underwear

loans.name: Walter Antonio

texts.es:
Walter, de 37 años de edad, se dedica a la carpintería, reside en San Miguel, donde vive con su esposa y sus hijos de 15 y 17 años de edad, quienes dependen económicamente de él, la carpintería de Walter es estable ya que él lo conocen muchos clientes quienes lo recomiendan para nuevos trabajos, realiza decoraciones de madera en viviendas de residenciales, trabaja a domicilio y también en su taller.
Por el momento su dificultad es carecer de inventario ya que en ocasiones debe pedir a los clientes adelantado una parte del dinero para comenzar el trabajo, motivo que lo ha llevado a solicitar un préstamo para la compra de madera lo que permitirá tener disponibilidad de materia prima para salir con la demanda de trabajos.
Sueña con tener un negocio grande de muebles, ser reconocido por muchas personas e ir mejorando su trabajo cada día.
texts.en:
Walter, 37, is a carpenter.  He lives in San Miguel with his wife and children who are 15 and 17 years of age and depend economically on him.  Walter’s carpentry shop is stable now because he is known by many customers who recommend him for jobs.  He does wood decorations on residential properties, works both in his shop and on site.

For the moment his difficulty is the lack of stock inventory.  Sometimes he has to ask his customers for advance payments in order to start working.  This is why he’s asking for a loan to be able to buy lumber to have raw materials on hand so that he can meet customer demand.  He dreams with having a large furniture making business, to be widely known by many people and to improve his work every day.

loans.use: To buy lumber.

loans.name: Felicitas

texts.es:
Felicitas es socia del Banco Comunal Gotitas de Amor, tiene 48 años, es casada y tiene 3 hijos.
Se dedica a la venta de artículos de ferretería, El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en surtir su mercadería comprando clavos, focos, tubos, alicates, etc.
Felicitas se dedica a la venta de artículos de ferretería hace años, aprendió de este negocio de su hermano que antes trabajo en una ferretería  Él le dio la idea, comenzó con un capital de S/. 200.00 Nuevos Soles vendiendo en la calle en el Jr. Grau, ahora cuenta con un puesto propio en el mercado 12 de Abril.  
Le gusta las reuniones de su Banco Comunal porque puede acceder al crédito y puede ahorrar, también aprende de las capacitaciones sobre los negocios y la familia.
Su sueño es que pueda crecer su negocio y que sus hijos sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Felicitas is a member of the 'Gotitas de Amor' community bank.  She is 48 years old, married and has 3 children.

Felicitas sells hardware.  She will use the loan she is requesting to stock her business with merchandise such as nails, lightbulbs, tubes, pliers, etc.  She has been selling hardware for years.  She learned this business from her brother who used to work in a hardware store.  He was the one who gave her the idea.  Felicitas started her business with 200 Peruvian soles in capital and sold her products on the street in Jr. Grau.  She now has her own stall in the '12 de Abril' market.

Felicitas likes her community bank's meetings because she can access loans, save and also learn from the training sessions about business and family.  Her dream is to grow her business and for her children to become professionals.

loans.use: To buy nails, lightbulbs, tubes, pliers, etc.

loans.name: El Árbol Group

texts.es:
El grupo el Árbol está conformado por cuatro féminas trabajadoras una de ellas es la señora Lidia Marina Dávila quien es propietaria de una tortillería, realiza pasteles, refrescos y nacatamales negocio que incio hace 30 años para darle a sus hijos una buena educción y vida. Ella sueña con mejorar su negocio y poder seguir con salud para ver crecer a sus nietos.
Las otras integrantes del grupo son Mayra R. Picado de 30 años quien tiene una tortillería, Auxiliadora L. realiza nacatamales comida típica a base de masa y cerdo, y Jenny Martínez García  vende cosméticos  Avon y Arabella.
texts.en:
The El Arbol (The Tree) group is composed of four hard working women.  One of them is Mrs. Lidia Marina Dávila who owns a tortilla shop.  She makes cakes, refreshments and nacatamales (Nicaraguan style tamales popular as weekend fare).  She started this business 30 years ago in order to provide her children with a good education and life.  She dreams with improving the business and to stay healthy in order to see her grandchildren grow up.

The other group members are: Mayra R. Picado, 30, who has a tortilla shop, Auxiliadora L., who makes nacatamales and typical dishes based on corn dough and pork and Jenny Martínez García who sells Avon and Arabella brand cosmetics.

loans.use: For corn, flour, firewood, food coloring, etc.

loans.name: Luz Estela

texts.es:
la señora Lux Estela L. tiene 44 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene una hija, vive en casa de la mama con sus hermanos,  vive en la colonoia Fraternidad, se dedica a la venta de productos de consumo popular, tiene una pequeña pulperia,  atiende a los vecinos de la comunidad, vende lacteos, reftrescos de botella, jugos de lata y caja, huevos, harina, manteca, aceite y todo para el hogar ademas vende cosmeticos y ropa de niño.
 
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de mercaderia para surtir mas su negocio, quiere tener su negocio bien surtido para la epoca de navidad y asi poder tener mayores utilidades.
texts.en:
Lux Estela L. is 44 years old.  She is a single mother and has one daughter.  She lives in her mom's house with her siblings.  She lives in the Fraternidad neighborhood and has a small grocery store where she sells staple food products.  She serves her neighbors, selling dairy produts, bottled soft drinks, canned and boxed juice, eggs, flour, butter, oil and everything for the home.  She also sells cosmetics and children's clothes. 
 
She will use this loan to buy merchandise to better stock her business.  She would like to have a well-stocked business for the Christmas season so that she can make more profits.

loans.use: To buy pork, beef, chicken, eggs, beans, rice, sugar, butter, oil, soft drinks, bread, cookies, soap, toilet paper, salt, soup and pasta

loans.name: Fe Y Vida Group

texts.es:
El grupo Fe y Vida está conformado por tres mujeres trabajadoras, esforzadas y emprendedoras una de ellas es Brenda F. Medrano, coordinadora del grupo, quien se dedica al comercio de comida y gorros desde hace 4 años. Ella tiene un hijo de 11 años por el cual labora arduamente y desea tener algún día un tramo. 
Las otras integrantes del grupo son Juana P. de 48 años quien se dedica al comercio de nacatamales, sopas, frescos, helados, rifas y cosméticos Avon y zermat etc. y María Margarita P. comercializa ropa usada desde hace un año.
texts.en:
The Fe y Vida (Faith & Life) Group is composed of three hard working, dedicated, enterprising women.  One of them is Brenda F. Medrano, group coordinator.  She has sold food and caps for four years.  She has an 11 year old son for whom she works hard.  She hopes some day to have her own sales stand.

The other group members are: Juana P., 48, who sells nacatamales, soups, blended fruit drinks, ice cream, lottery tickets, Avon and Zermat brand cosmetics, etc. and María Margarita P. who has sold used clothes for the last year.

loans.use: For basic grains.

loans.name: Delia Maria

texts.es:
Delia de 47 años,  es una mujer trabajadora que ha trabajado por sus tres hijos para darle un buen futuro. Por eso comenzó la venta de almuerzos para tener una actividad económica estable y mantener a sus hijos. 

 Viviendo en una zona urbana llamada Orquídeas de Guayaquil (zona urbana, llamada las orquídeas porque en su descubrimiento habían muchas flores orquídeas). Ha trabajado vendiendo almuerzos en su pequeño restaurante llamado “Delia”. Desde muy temprano comienza a preparar la comida hasta que comienza a vender los almuerzos en un puesto que tiene en su casa. 

Para seguir con el restaurante y ampliarlo ella quiere comprar con el préstamo una cocina y sillas. En el futuro quiere tener un local para tener espacio suficiente y atender a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Delia is 47 years old.  She is a hard-working woman who has worked for her three children to give them a good future.  She started a business selling lunches so that she could have a stable business activity and support her children. 

Delia lives in an urban area called Orquídeas de Guayaquil (an urban area called 'las orquídeas' - orchids - because when the place was discovered they found many orchids there).  She sells her lunches in her small restaurant called 'Delia'.   She starts preparing the food very early in the morning and she then sells it in her home.

To continue with her restaurant and to expand it, Delia would like to use her loan to buy a stove and chairs.  In the future, she would like to have premises which would provide her with enough space and to continue serving her customers.

loans.use: To buy a stove and chairs

loans.name: Maria Francisca

texts.es:
Doña María, reside en Lolotiquillo, departamento de Morazán, tiene 47 años de edad, se dedica a la crianza de cerdos y al cultivo de maíz, vive con sus cuatro hijos y tres nietos, su negocio es la crianza de cerdos y cuando estos han engordado los lleva a vender y con la ayuda de sus hijos y nietos desarrolla la siembra de maíz, estas son sus fuentes de ingreso con las que cuenta para salir de sus gastos y comprar la alimentación para toda la familia.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de cerdos, ya que desea invertir comprando algunos cerditos para engordar y comenzar el proceso para luego venderlos, con este préstamo podrá obtenerlos y seguir en el negocio.
Su mayor deseo es ayudar a sus nietos para que estudien y puedan prepararse desarrollando su vida en un mejor ambiente.
texts.en:
María lives in Lolotiquillo, Morazán department.  She is 47 years old and raises pigs and grows corn.  She lives with her four children and three grandchildren.  Her business is raising pigs.  When they have been fattened up she takes them to sell. Her children and grandchildren help her with the corn farming.  These are the sources of income she counts on to cover expenses and buy food for the entire family.

She is asking for a loan to buy pigs because she wants to invest in buying a few piglets to raise and start the process leading to their sale.  With the loan she will be able to do this and stay in business.

Her greatest desire is to help her grandchildren study and prepare themselves to develop their lives in a better environment.

loans.use: To buy pigs.

loans.name: Luis Javier

texts.es:
Luis es padre de familia de dos hijos,  casado, tiene la edad de 57 años ha sido muy esforzado para apoyar a su familia.
El se desempeña como director de una ong, desde hace varios años en donde ha logrado mantener su empleo.
Este es su segundo crédito en donde ha demostrado un buen comportamiento de pago, siendo su primer crédito  para mejoras  a su vivienda, a si como este nuevo que será para la reparación y amplitud de dos closet. En donde comprara materiales necesarios para comenzar. Logrando mejores condiciones personales.
texts.en:
Luis has two children.  He is 57 years old, married and has worked hard to support his family.

He has worked as a manager of an NGO for several years and he has managed to keep his job there.

This is Luis' second loan.  He has shown himself to be good at making his repayments.  His first loan was used to make improvements to his home.  This new loan will be used to repair and expand two built-in closets.  He will buy the materials he needs to start the job which will help him to achieve better personal living conditions.

loans.use: To buy materials to repair and expand two built-in closets which will improve his personal living conditions

loans.name: Sergio Jose

texts.es: Sergio tiene 2 hijos a su cargo. El se dedica a brindar el servicio de barbería. Hace más de 14 años que tiene este negocio pues es el único medio de vida que tiene a su alcance.  Inicia por sugerencias de amigos porque desde la edad de 20 años Sergio sabía perfectamente cortar pelo con el paso del tiempo decide establecer su propio establecimiento con el fin de proporcionar los ingresos necesarios para su hogar. Este crédito es para la compra de tijera, peines, talcos entre otras cosas.
texts.en: Sergio has 2 children. He works at his barbershop. He has had this business for more than 14 years as this is the only way of life that he has available to him. He began the business from his friend's suggestions because since he was 20 years old Sergio has known how to cut hair perfectly. As time passed he decided to establish his own business in order to provide the necessary income for his household. This loan is to buy scissors, combs and talcum powder among other things.

loans.use: Capital for Work

loans.name: Maria De Las Nieves

texts.es:
Maria de la Nieves es socia del Banco comunal Gotitas de amor, es casada, tiene 46 años y  7 hijos.
Maria de la Nieves es feriante, aprendió de este negocio de una amiga,  viaja a la feria de Tambo, ahí vende ropa para damas caballeros y niños y le va bien.
El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de ropas para surtir.
Le gusta las reuniones de su Banco Comunal porque puede acceder a los créditos y puede ahorrar.
Su sueño es que su negocio crezca y que sus hijos sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Maria de la Nieves is a member of the 'Gotitas de Amor' community bank.  She is married, 46 years old, and has 7 children.

Maria de la Nieves is a market trader and learned the business from a friend.  She travels to Tambo market and there she sells women's, men's and children's clothes.  Her business is doing well.

Maria de las Nieves will invest the loan she is requesting in buying clothes to stock her business.  She likes her community bank meetings because they allow her to access loans and to save.  Her dream is for her business to grow and for her children to become professionals.

loans.use: To buy a variety of clothes

loans.name: Almohada Group

texts.es:
El grupo Almohada está conformado por tres mujeres trabajadoras, esforzadas y emprendedoras una de ellas es Nora B. quien es propietaria de una panadería desde hace un año. Ella sueña con prosperar seguir adelante con este pequeño negocio familiar por ello invertirá en harina, levadura, azúcar…etc.
Las otras integrantes del grupo son Dagne Idalgo Güenbes de 34 años se dedica al comercio de granos básicos desde hace un año y Lesbia Raquel D. vende cosméticos desde hace cuatro años.
texts.en:
The Almohada (Pillow) group is composed of three hard working, dedicated, enterprising women.  One of them is Nora B. who has owned a bakery for a year.  She dreams with progressing and getting ahead with this small family business.  Thus, she will invest in flour, yeast, sugar, etc.

The other group members are: Dagna Idalgo Güenbes, 34, who has sold basic grains for the last year and Lesbia Raquel Dávila who has sold cosmetics for the last four years.

loans.use: For raw materials, especially flour.

loans.name: Yuzira

texts.es:
Yuzira es socia del Banco Comunal Gotitas de Amor, es soltera y tiene 19 años.
Yuzira tiene un recreo con su mamá, antes de tener el recreo tenían una tienda de abarrotes y decidieron cambiar por el recreo porque hay mas ingresos. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en comprar insumos para la preparación de alimentos de su recreo como: arroz, carnes, verduras, papas y especies, tambien aguas gaseosa y bebidas alcohólicas.
A Yuzira le gusta las reuniones de su Banco Comunal porque le dan crédito y puede ahorrar, aprendió a ser puntual y responsable. 
Su sueño es que su recreo crezca y que sea reconocido.
texts.en:
Yuzira is a member of the 'Gotitas de Amor' community bank.  She is 19 years old and single.

Yuzira owns a cafe with her mom.  Before they had the cafe they had a grocery store.  They decided to make the change because a cafe makes more income.  Yuzira will invest the loan she is requesting in buying supplies for preparing the food she offers in her cafe such as: rice, meat, vegetables, potatoes and spices.  She will also buy soda and alcoholic beverages.

Yuzira likes her community bank's meetings because they give access to loans and she can save.  She has also learned to be punctual and responsible.  Her dream is for her cafe to grow and for it to become well known.

loans.use: To buy provisions such as rice, meat and vegetables

loans.name: Amor Y Esperanza 1, 2 Group

texts.en:
Elene is the coordinator of her group Amor y Esperanza 1, 2 (love and hope). She makes her home here in a simple structure with her long-term partner and their three children. She says that her dream is to have her own house. 

Elene is excited to be taking her fourth loan with Esperanza after having successfully repaid her previous loan and grown her business. She has had her business for amost 14 years, starting to sell products before she moved to the Dominican Republic. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business by buying different products like clothing, shoes, and cosmetics. She will also use future profits to reinvest in her business.

Her story is representative of her group and of Esperanza's Haitian and Dominican clients — many of whom recently emigrated to the DR from Haiti. Her group is located in the urban slums surrounding Santo Domingo. This area, like nearly all impoverished areas of the Dominican Republic, suffers from unreliable electricity and running water — none of which is potable.

loans.use: to buy miscellaneous products to sell

loans.name: Yahara Group

texts.es:
El grupo Yahara lo conforman tres mujeres trabajadoras, esforzadas y emprendedoras una de ellas es la señora Carla Patrica G. de 33 años es propietaria de una pulpería desde hace 5 años e invertirá el crédito en granos básicos (azúcar, arroz, aceite, frijoles etc…).
Las otras integrantes del grupo son Rosa Argentina M. de 43 años se dedica al comercio de ropa desde hace 8 años y Carolina del Socorro L. de 33 años se dedica al comercio de tortilla, güirila, nacatamales desde hace 8 años.
texts.en:
The Yahara group is composed of three hard working, dedicated, enterprising women.  One of them is Mrs. Carla Patricia G., 33.  She has owned a grocery store for the last 5 years and will invest the loan in basic grains (sugar, rice, oil, beans, etc.)

The other group members are: Rosa Argentina M., 43, who has sold clothes for the last 8 years and Carolina del Socorro L., 33, who has sold tortilla, güirila (tortilla made from young white corn. They are thick, sweet, filling, and usually eaten with crumbled white cheese.  Güirilas are cooked on a hot metal sheet in banana leaves to prevent them from sticking or burning) and nacatamales for the last 8 years.

loans.use: For basic grains.

loans.name: Carminda

texts.es:
la señora Carminda García R. tiene 45 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene tres hijos.
Carminda se dedica a la venta de ropa, calzado y accesorios para damas y caballeros.
Carminda se levanta muy temprano todos los dias de lunes a domingo para abrir su negocio y atender a sus clientes, les ofrece sandalias para hombre y mujer ropà para caballeros, damas, zapatos, gorras, adornos,
utencilios de cocina, ventiladores.
su negocio esta ubicado en la calle principal del mercado nuevo de San Lorenzo.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de mercaderia para tener bien surtido su negocio.
su sueño es construir su propia casa.
texts.en:
Carminda García R. is 45 years old.  She is a single mother and has three children.

Carminda sells clothes, footwear, and men's and women's accessories.

Carminda gets up very early every day, from Monday to Sunday, to open her business and serve her customers.  She offers them men's and women's sandals, men's and women's clothes, shoes, caps, decorations, cooking utensils and fans.  Her business is located in the main street of the 'Mercado Nuevo' (New Market) in San Lorenzo.

Carminda will use her loan to buy merchandise to better stock her business.  Her dream is to build her own house.

loans.use: To buy cosmetics, shoes, purses, glue, hooks, bracelets, talcum powder, deodorants, creams, lotions, and perfumes

loans.name: Las Chicas Group

texts.es:
El grupo las Chicas está conformado por tres personas trabajadoras, esforzadas y emprendedoras una de ellas es Jaqueline A. Reyes de 29 años se dedica al comercio de ropa (camisas, pantalones, jeans, blusas, vestido, camisetas, faldas…etc.) este negocio lo inicio con poco y con forme al tiempo, su ardua labor y los prestamos ha ido creciendo. 
 Ella invertirá en mercadería para surtir su negocio y aprovechar esta temporada.
Las otras integrantes son Karla E. quien vende ropa y Marlene M. quien comercializa ropa y calzado. Ellas desean salir adelante y crecer.
texts.en:
The Las Chicas group is composed of three hard working, dedicated, enterprising people.  One of them is Jaqueline A. Reyes, 29, who sells clothes (shirts, pants, jeans, blouses, dresses, undershirts, skirts, etc.).  She started the business with very little but as time has gone by, with her hard work and loans, it has been growing.  She will use the loan to buy merchandise to stock her business and take advantage of this season.

The other members are: Karla E. who sells clothes, and Marlene M. who sells clothes and shoes.  They want to get ahead and grow.

loans.use: For clothing.

loans.name: Emperatriz

texts.es:
la señora Emperatriz M. C. es soltera y no tiene dependientes, sus hijos ya estan grandes., vive en la aldea el Caimito, tiene casa propia y un negocio de venta de ropa y calzado en el mercado nuevo de san lorenzo, todos lo dias viaja para abrir su negocio, ofrece ropa, calzado, gorras, fajas, lentes, y mucho mas.
 
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de ropa a la moda, tiene varios pedidos y desea tener surtido su negocio.
 
su sueño es que su negocio crezca mucho mas y tener buenas ganancias.
texts.en:
Emperatriz M. C. is single and doesn't have any dependents as her children are already grown up.  She lives in the village of Caimito.  She has her own home and a business selling clothes and footwear in the 'Mercado Nuevo' (New Market) in San Lorenzo.  She travels there every day to open her business where she sells clothes, footwear, caps, belts, sunglasses and a lot more besides.
 
Emperatriz will use her loan to buy fashionable clothes.  She has several orders and would like to have her business well stocked.  Her dream is for her business to grow a lot and to make good profits.

loans.use: To buy jeans, shirts, t-shirts, sunglasses, caps, backpacks, sandals and ladies' shoes

loans.name: Elba

texts.es:
La señora Elba del Carmen U. es una mujer trabajadora, esforzada y emprendedora de 48 años quien se dedica al comercio de escobas de nailon, limpiones, cepillos para lavar ropa, cepillos para lavar paredes y cepillos para lavar inodoros desde hace 20 años. 
Ella tiene seis hijos los cuales son mayores de edad y uno de ellos es quien trabaja con ella.
texts.en:
Elba del Carmen U. is a hard-working and enterprising 48 year-old woman who sells nylon brooms, tea towels, brushes for cleaning walls and toilet brushes.  She has been in this business for 20 years.

She has six grown-up children and one of them works with her.

loans.use: To buy cleaning products

loans.name: Amor Y Esperanza 3, 4, 5 Group

texts.en:
Gislaine is the coordinator of her group Amor y Esperanza 3, 4, 5 (love and hope). She makes her home here in a simple structure with her husband and their two children. She says that her biggest challenge is to give her kids all they need and educate them. 

Gislaine is excited to be taking her fourth loan with Esperanza after having successfully repaid her previous loan and grown her business. She has had her business for almost 4 years, starting to sell different products from a bag with some saving she had. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business by buying big packages of used cloths. She will use the profits reinvest in her business.

Her story is representative of her group and of Esperanza's Haitian and Dominican clients — many of whom recently emigrated to the DR from Haiti. Her group is located in the urban slums surrounding Santo Domingo. This area, like nearly all impoverished areas of the Dominican Republic, suffers from unreliable electricity and running water — none of which is potable. 

The loan has separate pictures just because we want to show everybody's face.

loans.use: to buy packages of second-hand clothing

loans.name: Gloria Jamileth

texts.es:
la señora Gloria Jamileth S. Muñoz tiene 33 años de edad, tiene tres hijos, esta casada y su esposo se dedica  a la construccion, Gloria se dedica a la venta de mariscos pescado y camaron.
juntos trabajan duro para sacar adelante a sus hijos.
Gloria y su esposo en su carro viajan desde coyolito hasta juticalpa Olancho a vender el pescado y los camarones cada cuatro dia,  y de viernes a domingo sale a vender Choluteca.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de mariscos a precio de mayorista.
su sueño es darles una buena educacion a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Gloria Jamileth S. Muñoz is 33 years old.  She is married and has three children.  Her husband works in the building trade.  Gloria sells seafood, fish and shrimp.  She and her husband both work hard to get their children ahead in life.

Gloria and her husband travel in their car from Coyolito to Juticalpa Olancho to sell fish and shrimp every four days.  From Friday to Sunday she goes to sell her products in Choluteca.

Gloria will use her loan to buy seafood wholesale.  Her dream is to provide her children with a good education.

loans.use: To buy fish and shrimp

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Santiago

texts.es:
El señor Santiago tiene 52 años de edad, vive el trópico de Cochabamba, en la localidad de Entre Rios, es casado tiene cuatro  hijos, y ratica en el trópico como hace 8 años.

Santiago vino del municipio de Vinto de Cochabamba, hace 8 años en busca de mayores oportunidades de vida, junto a su familia,  en su  pueblo ya no había oportunidades de crecer, los terrenos se agotaron, el rendimiento de producción bajo. Posteriormente decidieron migrar al trópico de Cochabamba, cuando llego trabajo como peón los primeros años, y poco a poco fue ahorrando para comprarse un pequeño terreno, y empezó a sembrar yuca, arroz, de esta manera espeso su radicatoria.

El solicita el crédito, para producir estevia ya que es una buena alternativa, y  si de esta manera seguir superándose junto a su familia y poderle sacar adelante a su familia, en el futuro el cliente quiere tener grandes extensiones de estevia, ya que tiene un mercado seguro.
texts.en:
Santiago, 52, lives in tropical Cochabamba in Entre Ríos.  He’s married and has four children.  He has lived in the tropics for about 8 years.

Santiago came to Cochabamba from Vinto about 8 years ago looking for better life opportunities with his family.  In his town there weren’t any opportunities for growth available.  The soil was exhausted and production decreased.  They decided to migrate to the tropics of Cochabamba.  When he arrived he worked as a laborer the first years and gradually saved up to buy a small plot of land.  He started to plant manioc and rice thus cementing his residency.

He is asking for a loan to produce stevia which is a good alternative to continue growing with his family and getting ahead.  In the future he wants to have large expanses of stevia because it has a guaranteed market.

loans.use: Capital for stevia farming.

loans.name: Jennifer Lourdes

texts.es:
Jenniffer de 25 años, es una joven emprendedora que tiene en su casa una pequeña tienda de accesorios y papelería. Viviendo con sus dos hijos en una zona urbana llamada Orquídeas de Guayaquil (zona urbana, llamada las orquídeas porque en su descubrimiento habían muchas flores orquídeas).   

Comenzó con la tienda de accesorios para poder mantener a sus hijos  vendiendo en la parte delantera de su casa accesorios, papelería, cuadernos, bebidas. Trabaja en la mañana y en las tardes le ayuda su mama y hermana ya que ella está estudiando.  Para seguir con su negocio ella quiere comprar con el préstamo algunos accesorios, cuadernos, papelería, bebidas etc. Su objetivo de trabajar con esfuerzo es expandir su negocio y darles un buen futuro a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Jenniffer is 25 years old.  She is an enterprising young woman who has a small store in her home where she sells accessories and stationery.  She lives with her two children in an urban area called Orquídeas de Guayaquil (an urban area which is called 'Las Orquídeas' - Orchids - because when the place was discovered, they found a lot of orchids there).

Jeniffer started her store so that she could support her children.  She sells accessories, stationery, exercise books and drinks in the front of her home.  She works in the mornings and in the afternoons her mom and sister help her because she is studying.  To continue in her business she would like to use her loan to buy some accessories, exercise books, stationery, drinks, etc.  Her goal is to expand her business and provide her children with a good future.

loans.use: To buy accessories, drinks and exercise books

loans.name: Gloria Argentina

texts.es:
la señora Gloria Argentina M. esta casada y no tiene dependientes, todos sus hijos son personas mayores.
Gloria se dedica a la venta de abarroteria como ser pastas, arroz, azucar, jabon, queso, harina, aceite, maiz, y todo lo relacionado con productos de consumo diario.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de algunos productos que necesita para surtir mas su pulperia.
 sus clientes son personas de la localidad y lugares aledaños.
las ganancias las necesita para cubrir con los gastos personales y los gastos del hogar.
texts.en:
Gloria Argentina M. is married and has no dependents.  All of her children are already grown up.

Gloria sells groceries such as pasta, rice, sugar, soap, cheese, flour, oil, corn and other daily-use products.

She will use her loan to buy some products that she needs to better stock her small grocery store.  Her customers are people from her own town and neighboring places.  She needs the profits she makes from her store to cover her personal expenses and her household expenses.

loans.use: To buy rice, beans, sugar, butter, oil, margarine, soap, batteries, toilet paper, candles, matches, toothpaste, sanitary towels, soup, pasta, sauces, soft drinks and juices

loans.name: Aida

texts.es:
Aida Luz A. de 56 años es una mujer trabajadora, esforzada y emprendedora quien se dedica al comercio de frutas y verduras desde hace 8 años. Ella invertirá el crédito en yuca, papas, repollo, tomate, quequisque, ayote, chayote, pipianes, naranjas…etc. 
Ella tiene tres hijos ya mayores y desea seguir trabajando y superándose.
texts.en:
Aída Luz A., 56, is a hard working, dedicated, enterprising woman who has sold fruit and vegetables for the last 8 years. 

She will use the loan to invest in manioc, potatoes, cabbage, tomatoes, quequisque (taro root), ayote (pumpkin-like squash), chayote, pumpkins, oranges, etc.

She has three adult children and she wants to continue working and improving.

loans.use: For fruit and vegetables.

loans.name: Nory Aracely

texts.es:
Nory de 37 años, tiene un taller de costura/confección y vive en las Orquídeas de Guayaquil (zona urbana, llamada las orquídeas porque en su descubrimiento habían muchas flores orquídeas).  

La mama de Nory le enseño a coser y a confeccionar ropa. Comenzando con una maquina de coser  pudo tener suficientes clientes para solventar sus gastos. Trabaja todos los días en su casa confeccionando pantalones, vestidos, blusas a sus clientes y así tener ingresos suficientes para darle una mejor vida a su hijo de 4 años.

Para poder continuar con su trabajo necesita comprar una maquina y telas para su taller de costura, en el futuro quiere mejorar su taller de costura y darle una buena estabilidad económica a su familia.
texts.en:
Nory is 37 years old.  She has a dressmaking workshop and lives in las Orquídeas de Guayaquil (an urban area which is called 'Orquídeas' - orchids - because when the place was discovered they found many orchids there).  

Nory's mom taught her how to sew and make clothes.  She started with one sewing machine and managed to attract enough customers to cover her expenses.  She works every day in her home making pants, dresses and blouses for her customers so that she has enough income to provide her 4 year-old son with a better life.

To continue with her work, Nory needs to buy a sewing machine and fabric for her sewing workshop.  In the future she would like to improve her dressmaking workshop and provide her family with good financial stability.

loans.use: To buy a sewing machine and fabric

loans.name: Maria Teresa

texts.es: Maria Teresa tiene 69 años, su actividad es una pulpería. Hace más de 14 años que tiene este negocio inicio por la necesidad de una fuente de ingreso necesaria para mantener a sus 3 hijos que desde muy pequeños se ha hecho cargo de ellos. Ella tiene mucho tiempo de tener su negocio y atender a sus clientes que siempre llegan en busca de diferentes productos. El motivo de su crédito es para la compra de materia prima como golosinas, refrescos, pan, detergentes, granos básicos entre otras cosas que son necesarias.
texts.en:
María Teresa, 69, has a grocery store.  She’s had it for over 14 years.  She started it because she needed a source of income to support her three children whom she’s cared for since they were very little.  She has been in business taking care of her customers who always come by looking for various products for a long time.

The reason for the loan is to buy raw materials like: sweets, soft drinks, bread, detergents and basic grains among other necessary things.

loans.use: To buy stock items for her store.

loans.name: Eiby Melissa

texts.es:
la señora Eiby Melissa H. tiene 27 años de edad, esta casada y tiene dos hijos, Eiby se dedica al comercio desde hace dos años tiene una pulperia en su casa de habitacion, sus clientes son los vecinos y otras personas que trabajan cerca de la zona.
Su esposo es comerciante, vende pescados.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de mercaderia para surtir su negocio un poco mas, ya que en esta epoca la exigencias de sus clientes son mayores y necesita estar preparada para cumplirles con todo lo que necesitan.
las ganancias las necesita para salir adelante con su familia.
texts.en:
Eiby Melissa H. is 27 years old.  She is married and has two children.  Eiby has been selling for two years.  She has a small grocery store in her home.  Her customers are neighbors and other people who work near the area.  Her husband is a salesman.  He sells fish.

Eiby will use her loan to buy merchandise to stock her business a little more since her customers' demands are higher during this period and she needs to be prepared to fill their demands with everything they need.  She needs the profits from her business to get her family ahead.

loans.use: To buy butter, rice, beans, corn flour, wheat flour, coffee, cookies, juices, soft drinks, pasta, sauces, soups, cereal, oats, batteries, candles, matches, toilet paper, soap, sanitary towels, toothpaste, chilis and sardines

loans.name: Martha

texts.es: La señora Martha Torres A. es una mujer trabajadora, esforzada y emprendedora quien se dedica al comercio de ropa. Ella tiene su pequeño puesto en el populoso mercado Oriental desde hace 12 años negocio que poco a poco fue surgiendo en el cual invertirá el crédito.
texts.en: Mrs. Martha Torres A. is a hard working, dedicated, enterprising woman who is a clothing merchant. She has had a small stand in the crowded Oriental Market for the last 12 years.  The business has gradually been growing.  She will invest the loan in it.

loans.use: For clothing.

loans.name: Delmis Marina

texts.es:
la señora Delmis Marina F. A. tiene 39 años de edad, esta casada y tiene tres hijos, sus hijos estudian y uno de ellos se esta graduando de policia.
su esposo le ayuda en la panederia con la distrubucion, ya que ellos cuentan con un vehiculo para transportar el producto a diferentes lugares.
doña delmis se dedica al negocio de pan desde hace 10 años, con esta actividad a logrado hacer su casa.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de los materiales para la fabricacion de los panes.
se a quedado un poco descapitalizada y desea inyectarle capital al negocio.
 
sus mayores deseos en esta navidad es que la paz y el amor del señor nos visite a todos en nuestros hogares y pide salud y fortaleza para enfrentar las adversidades.
texts.en:
Delmis Marina F. A. is 39 years old.  She is married and has three children.  Her children are studying and one of them is graduating as a policeman.

Delmis' husband supports her with deliveries in her bakery as they have a vehicle for transporting their products to different places.  Delmis has been in the bread-making business for 10 years and this activity has helped her to support her household.

She will use this loan to buy materials for making bread.  She doesn't have much capital right now and would like to inject capital into her business.

Delmis' greatest wish this Christmas is for the peace and love of the Lord to visit us all in our homes.  She requests health and strength to face life's adversities.

loans.use: To buy flour, sugar, butter, margarine, flavorings, vanilla, yeast, baking soda and firewood

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Francisco Antonio

texts.es:
Don Francisco, es un agricultor tiene 54 años de edad, reside en Jiquilisco departamento de Usulután, vive con su esposa y sus hijos, tienen casa propia y se dedica a la siembra de hortalizas, él tiene 10 años de dedicarse a los cultivos de hortalizas y es su fuente de ingreso.
Actualmente está en proceso de comprar abono y tratamiento para la plagas ya que está preparándose para sembrar pero no tiene lo suficiente para realizar la compra por lo que solicita un préstamo para realizar dicha compra y llevar a cabo la siembra y darle los cuidos necesarios para obtener una mejor cosecha.
Él quiere realizar una buena siembra, que su producción sea abundante y sana, con su familia quiere seguir unidos trabajando por la alimentación y la salud de ellos.
texts.en:
Francisco, 54, lives in Jiquilisco, Usulután department with his wife and children in their own house.  He is a vegetable farmer.  He has been a vegetable farmer for 10 years and it is his source of income.

He is currently in the process of buying manure and insecticides because he’s getting ready to plant but does not have enough money to buy.  He is asking for a loan for this purchase to be able to carry out the planting and provide necessary care to obtain a better harvest.

He wants to have a good crop, that his production is abundant and healthy.  He wants to continue working together with his family for their food and good health.

loans.use: To buy manure and insecticides.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
la sra. Luz Marina N. tiene 24 años de edad, esta soltera y vive en la casa de sus papas.
no tiene hijos ni novio, Luz se dedica a la venta de productos de consumo diario.

en sus tiempos libres le gusta escuchar musica, en su pulperia atiende a los vecinos.
el credito lo utilizara para surtir un poco mas su negocio.

su mayor sueño es que las ventas sean mejores en estos meses para lograr tener mayores ganacias y suplir algunas de su necesidades que tiene por los momentos.
texts.en:
Luz Marina N. is 24 years old.  She is single and lives in her parents' home.  She doesn't have children or a boyfriend.  Luz sells essential food products.  In her spare time, she likes to listen to music.  She serves her neighbors in her small grocery store.

Luz will use her loan to stock her business a little better.  Her greatest dream is for her sales to improve during this period so that she makes more profits and can thereby cover some of the needs that she has right now.

loans.use: To buy eggs, condiments, soup, pasta, butter, oil, rice, beans, flour, soap, pasta, sugar, bread, coffee, cookies and milk

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: And Jubbo Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité AND JUBBO est créé depuis 7 mois. Il vient juste de clôturer son premier cycle de 6 mois. Il est composé de 19 femmes qui sont toutes issus du même village. Elles se sont organisées par proximité et par affinité.

Ndoumbé K., debout à droite de la photo, de jaune vêtue est responsable du groupe. Elle est âgée de 44 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 04 enfants. 

Elle fait de la broderie et crochet de draps de lit. Elle pratique cette activité depuis son jeune âge, il y a de cela 20 ans environs.

Son crédit lui permettra de s'approvisionner en fournitures pour sa couture et sa broderie d'une part, et d'autre part acheter des tissus.

Son objectif est de soutenir son mari dans la prise en charge des besoins familiaux: par exemple la nourriture et la santé de enfants.
texts.en: The solidarity group AND JUBBO has been created sevens month ago. It just finished its first six-months lending cycle. It is composed of 19 women, all living in the same village. They are neighbors and friends who decided to form a group together. Ndoumbé K., standing to the right in the photo, in a yellow outfit, is the group’s leader. She is 44 years old. She is married and the mother of four. She does embroidery and crochet work on bed linens. She has been in this trade from a young age, for about 20 years now. This credit will allow her to purchase, first, sewing and embroidery supplies, and, second, fabrics. Her goal is to help her husband provide for the family, for example, food and healthcare expenses for their children.

loans.use: Purchasing sewing supplies and fabrics

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy 60 units of #26 bicycle tires, 60 units of #24 bicycle tires, 28 units of #26 bicycle inner tubes, 28 units of #24 bicycle inner tubes, 28 units of  #24 bicycle tire rims and 30 units of #26 bicycle tire rims.

loans.name: Bok Jom Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité BOK JOM est créé depuis 07 mois. Il vient d'effectuer son premier remboursement. Il est composé de 20 femmes qui sont toutes issues du même village. Elles ont formé leur groupe par affinité et par voisinage.

Ndoumbé KANE debout à l'extrême droite de la photo est la responsable du groupe. Elle est âgée de 36 ans. Elle fait de la broderie et crochet de draps de lit. Elle pratique cette activité depuis son jeune âge, il y a de cela 04 ans.

Avec son nouveau crédit elle va acheter des fournitures et des tissus pour continuer son activité de broderie et de crochet. 

Son objectif est de soutenir son mari dans la prise en charge des besoins familiaux: par exemple la nourriture et la santé de enfants.
texts.en:
Le groupe de solidarité BOK JOM est créé depuis 07 mois. Il vient d'effectuer son premier remboursement. Il est composé de 20 femmes qui sont toutes issues du même village. Elles ont formé leur groupe par affinité et par voisinage.

Ndoumbé KANE debout à l'extrême droite de la photo est la responsable du groupe. Elle est âgée de 36 ans. Elle fait de la broderie et crochet de draps de lit. Elle pratique cette activité depuis son jeune âge, il y a de cela 04 ans.

Avec son nouveau crédit elle va acheter des fournitures et des tissus pour continuer son activité de broderie et de crochet. 

Son objectif est de soutenir son mari dans la prise en charge des besoins familiaux: par exemple la nourriture et la santé de enfants.

loans.use: Acheter des fournitures de broderie, de crochet et de couture

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase of grocery store inventory

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy 12 pairs of large hoop earrings, 10 tiger eye rings, 12 animal bracelets, 10 Onyx rings, 12 heart bracelets, 10 anklets and 12 ball chains

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Work supplies

loans.name: Rafael Octavio

texts.es: Rafael Octavio tiene 41 años, su actividad es una abarrotería. Desde hace mas 4 años que tiene este negocio. El inicio este medio de vida por la necesidad de obtener una fuente de ingreso a su hogar. Es una persona muy responsable con su negocio ya que todos los días se tiene que levantar temprano para arreglar su local que es donde ofrece los productos que sus clientes le solicitan. El motivo de este crédito es para la compra de materia prima como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite,  maíz y cereales entre otras cosas.
texts.en: Rafael Octavio is 41 years old.  His business is a grocery store.  He has had this business for more than 4 years.  He started his business because he needed a source of income for his household.  He is a very responsible person as far as his business is concerned since he has to get up early every morning to sort out his premises where he offers products to his customers.  He is requesting this loan to buy merchandise such as rice, beans, sugar, oil, corn, cereal, etc.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Damaris Carolina

texts.es: Damaris tiene 27 años su actividad económica es venta de mercadería en general. Hace más de 11 años que se dedica a este negocio, por lo que es una actividad que le gusta mucho pues todos los días se levanta muy temprano, para realizar su labor y ofrecerlos a sus clientes. Damaris es una mujer muy responsable y que disfruta de su trabajo ya que por medio de él ha podido mantener a sus hijos, que están a su cargo y con mucho esfuerzo le ha brindado lo necesario. Ella solicita este financiamiento para capital de trabajo para la compra de materia prima. Su deseo es seguir adelante con este negocio que su único medio de vida.
texts.en:
27-year old Damaris has earned her living selling general merchandise for more than eleven years. It’s a job she really likes. She gets up early every morning to go to work and serve her customers.

Damaris is a very responsible woman who enjoys her work. It has enabled her to support her children, and by working hard she has provided them with the basic necessities. She is seeking a loan to buy more essential goods. Her goal is to continue with this business which is her only means of earning a living.

loans.use: working capital

loans.name: Marilu

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “QORICHUSPA”; Este banco está ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Marilu; ella tiene 35 años. La socia es casada, La socia se dedica a la artesanía ella tiene una tienda de artesanía, la socia trabaja elaborando aretes en alpaca, ella también realiza chompas de alpaca bebe, la socia elabora al por mayor sus trabajos y los distribuye en los mercados artesanales de Chinchero y Pisaq,  La soca es licenciada en Turismo ella trabaja en todo tipo de artesanía porque es su primera pasión la socia desea implementar su mercado y comprar materiales para realizar otro lote de sus trabajos, también desea estudiar ingles, ella continuará sus estudios de ingles. La socia solicita e préstamo para invertir en la compra de materiales y mercadería para la venta. 

La socia está feliz con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Marilu, 35, is a member of the “QORICHUSPA” communal bank located in Huanchac, Cusco department, Cusco province.

She is married and is a craftsperson.  She has a crafts store.  She makes alpaca earrings.  She also makes baby alpaca sweaters.  She makes her work at wholesale and sells in the various artisanal markets in Chinchero and Pisaq.  She also graduated with a degree in Tourism.  

She works with all kinds of crafts because they are her first passion and she wants to establish her market and buy materials to make another lot of her works.  She also wants to study English so will continue with her English studies.  She is asking for the loan to invest in the purchase of materials and merchandise to sell.

She is happy with the granted loan and pledges to repay in a timely fashion.

loans.use: To buy materials and merchandise to sell.

loans.name: Sel-Mar Group

texts.es: La foto fue tomada en casa de la señora Sagrario,una integrante D. grupo SEL-MAR que está ubicada en el estado de veracruz, en México. En la foto se ve al grupo de señoras alrededor de su mercancía, Sagrario tiene una papelería que inicio hace 3 años,solicita el prestamo para abastecer su negocio con nuevos productos,al momento de solicitar este préstamo se siente muy contenta y satisfecha,tiene 37 años y estudió la preparatoria,es casada y tiene 3 hijos,una mujer y dos varones,quiere este crédito para abastecer su negocio con nueva mercancía,también espera aumentar sus ventas y comprar una copiadora.Selma es la presidenta D. grupo,tiene 22 años,estudió hasta la preparatoria,es soltera y se dedica a la venta de cosméticos y calzado que inicio hace 4 años,solicita el prestamo para surtir pedidos, el grupo está conformado por 10 integrantes y retomó el nombre de la señora Selma para crear el de SEL- MAR.
texts.en:
This photo was taken in Sagrario's home.  Sagrario is a member of the SEL-MAR group which is located in the State of Veracruz, in Mexico.  In the photo you can see the group of ladies surrounding their merchandise.  Sagrario has a stationery store that she set up 3 years ago.  She is requesting a loan so that she can stock her business with new products.  As she requests this loan, she is feeling very happy and satisfied.  She is 37 years old and has her high school certificate.  She is married and has 3 children: one daughter and two sons.  She would like this loan to stock her business with new merchandise.  She also hopes to increase her sales and buy a photocopier.

Selma is the group's president.  She is 22 years old and also has her high school certificate.  She is single and has been selling cosmetics and footwear for four years.  She is requesting a loan to fill her orders.  The group has 10 members and used Selma's name to create the group's name SEL - MAR.

loans.use: To stock her business with new products

loans.name: Nestor Jacobo
